prompts.name: property_analysis
prompts.description: Analyze a property's value, comparables, and market trends
prompts.text:
Please analyze the property at {address}. Include:
1. Current valuation and rent estimate
2. Comparable properties in the area
3. Historical price trends
4. Market statistics for the ZIP code

Provide insights on whether this is a good investment opportunity.

prompts.name: market_overview
prompts.description: Get comprehensive market overview for an area
prompts.text:
Provide a comprehensive market overview for ZIP code {zip_code}. Include:
1. Market statistics (avg/median prices, price per sq ft)
2. Current active listings
3. Recent sales data
4. Market trends and insights
